about_the_game:
As the Captain of the Unsinkable Dragoon, with a sexy as sin first-mate, things are looking pretty good for you …until you notice trouble on the horizon. One of the Navy's top pirate hunters, Elise, is making a beeline straight for you! Wanting to impress your first-mate, Jill, you put on a brave face and start the swashbuckling only to be ambushed by Rebecca, a rival pirate looking to steal your ship. Normally being surrounded by Rebecca and Elise might be a dream come true but not when they're trying to kick your ass!

Trying your best to fend off two of the sexiest ladies who sail the high seas, Jill reveals this "ambush" was all set up as a trap so she could make off with your ship! All seems lost as you are overwhelmed by Rebecca and Elise, watching your ship sail away as you black out...

Left bound with no ship and no crew, you'll have to put together a real loyal crew and it just so happens there is an ocean of hotties who are looking for a tough and loving captain to serve under.


  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • The Pirates and Naval Officers are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • Really rock the boat as you spread your seed across multiple sexy scenes!

Pirate Booty and the Bukkake Buccaneer Is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

**PLEASE NOTE**
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: Turning the tides on the Navy
The one time "Unleash the Kraken!" isn't a euphemism
Which first mate shall I mate first?
Time to commit to a build to fight Jill
Revenge is a dish best served hard and rough

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
- There are scenes of sexual intercourse involving pregnant characters.
- Characters are coerced into performing sexual acts.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

short_description: Spread your seed across the seven seas! Your first-mate staged a mutiny, taking off with your precious ship. You'll have to build up a loyal crew, one slut at a time, to take back your ship and get revenge on the wench who took it from you in the first place!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
